issue.title: [CF 755] 5.2 PTR: "GetInstanceDifficulty" (a nil value)
issue.body:
A note to those reading this ticket: Please don't submit your tickets like this. I am putting this here as a reminder to myself to fix this, since I know exactly what the problem is. You should always follow the default ticket template that is provideded when you open a new ticket so that I will have the data I need to fully understand the issue you may be having.

Relevant: http://www.wowpedia.org/API_GetInstanceDifficulty
Also relevant: http://www.wowpedia.org/Patch_5.2.0/API_changes
